sections.heading: subject to forfeiture.In addition to the penalties provided in the Child Sexual Abuse Material Prevention Act, a sentencing court may order forfeiture as provided in sections 28-1601 to 28-1603

sections.text:
28-1806.Property subject to forfeiture.

In addition to the penalties provided in the Child Sexual Abuse Material Prevention Act, a sentencing court may order forfeiture as provided in sections 28-1601 to 28-1603.

SourceLaws 2016, LB1106, § 10;R.S.1943, (2016), § 28-1463.06;Laws 2025, LB383, § 6.Operative Date: September 3, 2025

Cross ReferencesChild Sexual Abuse Material Prevention Act, see section 28-1801.
